## InternalContractCaseCoreBehaviour interface

Describes how contract case behaves with this type of mock.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface InternalContractCaseCoreBehaviour 
```

Describes the source of state variables.

\* `'state'` - variables are provided by state handlers \* `'default'` - variables are provided by the default in the state descriptor
